cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Aerial Combatant attacks, for each kind of counter on target permanent or player, give that permanent or player another counter of that kind.
cards.notes: Could just work when you place counters, so your opponent won’t get buffs from you putting stun counters on it.

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
{G}{W}, {T}, Put a stun counter on Timberheart Guide: Untap each other creature you control.

Menace
Depth Trawler enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever one or more cards are put into a graveyard from a library, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
First strike, menace, haste
cards.notes: Make it not an artifact maybe?

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
When Thornbloom Shaman enters, surveil 1, then exile up to one target card from a graveyard. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Thornbloom Shaman gets +1/+1 for each card you own in exile.

{T}: Tap another target nonland permanent.
{T}: Untap another target permanent.
Whenever Brekka Shieldmage attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
When Backup Agent enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
When Inspiring Captain enters, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Flying [i](This creature can’t be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)[/i]

Flying [i](This creature can’t be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)[/i]
Vigilance [i](Attacking doesn’t cause this creature to tap.)[/i]
Whenever Goldkeep Swordmaster attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, it gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
When Auramancer enters, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
When Flitterguard enters, if it wasn’t cast, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Put a number of +1/+1 counters on target creature equal to one plus the number of cards named Workout Routine in your graveyard.
When Jotlund Jotun enters, distribute two +1/+1 counters among up two target creatures.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)[/i]
cards.notes:
Reprint

Flavor it as revealing darkness on Mystvale

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can’t attack or block.

Kicker {4} [i](You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Destroy target creature if it’s attacking or if this spell was kicked.

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.
Equip {1} [i]({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Kicker {1}{W} [i](You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, those creatures get +2/+1 until end of turn instead.
Return target artifact or creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If a creature enters this way, it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

Flying
When Faerie Miscreant enters, if you control another creature named Faerie Miscreant, draw a card.
Dockside Infiltrator can’t be blocked as long as you control an artifact.

Kicker {4}{U} [i](You may pay an additional {4}{U} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Flying
When Tempest Owl enters, if it was kicked, tap up to three target permanents.
When Rime Lynx enters, tap target creature you don’t control and put a stun counter on it.

Flying
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Thunder Drake.
{U}, {T}: Target player mills two cards. [i](They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)[/i]
When Salvager of Secrets enters, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
Deep-Sea Terror can’t attack unless there are seven or more cards in your graveyard.

Defender [i](This creature can’t attack.)[/i]
Sacrifice another artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on Wall of Scrap.
Sacrifice another artifact: Wall of Scrap can attack this turn as though it didn’t have defender.
Counter target spell.
Counter target creature or planeswalker spell.

This spell can’t be countered. [i](This includes by the ward ability.)[/i]
Tap up to two target creatures and put a stun counter on each of them. Investigate. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead. To investigate, create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Draw two cards.

Scry 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)[/i]
Draw a card.
Target player mills five cards. [i](They put the top five cards of their library into their graveyard.)[/i]
Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It can’t be blocked this turn.
Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)[/i]

Rat Colony gets +1/+0 for each other Rat you control.
A deck can have any number of cards named Rat Colony.

Flash [i](You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)[/i]
Deathtouch [i](Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)[/i]

Kicker {4}{B} [i](You may pay an additional {4}{B} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Howling Phantom enters if it was kicked, each opponent loses 5 life.
When Absorbing Tar enters or leaves, you may exile target card from a graveyard.

Flying
When Gorging Vulture enters, mill four cards. You gain 1 life for each creature card milled this way. [i](To mill four cards, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)[/i]

Kicker {1}{B} [i](You may pay an additional {1}{B} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Deathtouch
When Gnatfur Gangleader enters, if it was kicked, create two 1/1 black Rat creature tokens.
Whenever another creature you control dies, create a Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
When Boneclad Necromancer enters, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
Whenever Gloom Sower becomes blocked by a creature, that creature’s controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
Destroy target creature. Create two Treasure tokens. [i](They’re artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
Target player sacrifices a creature.
Target opponent discards two cards, mills a card, and loses 1 life. You gain 1 life. [i](To mill a cards, they put the top card of their library into their graveyard.)[/i]
Target player mills two cards, draws two cards, and loses 2 life. [i](To mill two cards, they put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)[/i]
You may mill three cards. Then return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. [i](To mill three cards, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)[/i]
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control.”

First strike [i](This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)[/i]
Menace [i](This creature can’t be blocked except by two or more creatures.)[/i]
{T}, Sacrifice Goldhound: Add one mana of any color.

Whenever Hired Laborer attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, create a Treasure token. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead. Treasure is an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
Whenever you cast a spell, if that spell was kicked, Bloodstone Goblin gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn. [i](It can’t be blocked except by two or more creatures.)[/i]

Kicker {R} [i](You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Goblin Bushwhacker enters, if it was kicked, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. [i](They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)[/i]

Kicker {4} [i](You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
If Kavu Ingressor was kicked, it enters with three +1/+1 counters on it.
cards.notes: Could be able to block and just have haste permanently.

cards.rules_text:
When Plundering Barbarian enters, choose one—
• Destroy target artifact.
• Create a Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]

Trample
When Reckless Charger enters, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, it gains haste until end of turn.
cards.notes: Reworked flavorfully — Shatterskull is a place on Zendikar

cards.rules_text: Whenever Viashino Seer enters or leaves the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until your next end step.

Reach [i](This creature can block creatures with flying.)[/i]
{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Goblin Curator gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Haste [i](This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)[/i]

Kicker {4} [i](You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage instead.
Rain Fire deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1, has haste, and attacks each turn if able.
When enchanted creature dies, you may search your library for a card named Infectious Bloodlust, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)[/i]

Kicker {3} [i](You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Target creature can’t block this turn. If Violent Panic was kicked, that creature deals damage equal to its power to its controller.

Defender [i](This creature can’t attack.)[/i]
{T}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on Compost Pile.
Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.
Whenever Civic Gardener attacks, untap target creature or land.
When Boding Bugs leaves your graveyard, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.
Whenever Mossgarden Scout attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, it gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
{2}{G}, {T}, Put a stun counter on Gathering Pine: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature card milled this way from your graveyard to your hand.
As long as you control another Beast, Lonely Boar gets +0/+3.

Reach [i](This creature can block creatures with flying.)[/i]
When Oakwood Sentinel enters, search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Kicker {G} [i](You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Bloomstag enters, if it was kicked, you gain 4 life.
Trample [i](This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking.)[/i]
Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don’t control.
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and untap it.

Kicker {2} [i](You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Reveal the top three cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. If Wild Gathering was kicked, repeat this process.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Exile three other cards from your graveyard: Return Puregrove’s Embrace from your graveyard to your hand.

Kicker {2} [i](You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If this spell was kicked, instead search your library for two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Kicker {5} [i](You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Spiteful Scarecrow enters, exile target creature if it’s a Bird or if Spiteful Scarecrow was kicked.

Flying
When Skyscanner enters, draw a card.

Flying
Steel Raptor gets +2/-2 as long as it’s tapped.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Letter of Acceptance: Draw a card.

Whenever Glowstone is put into your graveyard from anywhere or leaves your graveyard, add one mana of any color.
{1}, {T}: Sacrifice Glowstone.
{T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Hallowed Chosen.

Flying
Whenever Gemma’s Elite deals combat damage to a player, for each kind of counter on target permanent or player, give that permanent or player another counter of that kind.

Whenever Eager Redeemer attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it gains lifelink until end of turn.
{1}{W}: Untap target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

Kicker {2}{W} [i](You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Commander-in-Chief enters, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. If it was kicked, create three of those tokens instead.
Commander-in-Chief’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
Put a stun counter on Irrepressible Starblade: Irrepressible Starblade gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it. Activate only once per turn.

Kicker {2}{W} [i](You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Exile target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control unless this spell was kicked.
When Borrowed Time enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Borrowed Time leaves the battlefield.
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
{T}: Scry 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)[/i]

Whenever Bubbling Brewgeist becomes untapped, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}, {T}: Each player mills a card.
{T}, Put a stun counter on Treasure Diver: Draw a card. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
Flying

Kicker {1}{U} [i](You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Flash
Flying
When Slingwing Sailor enters, if it was kicked, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Kicker {X} [i](You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Draw two cards. If this spell was kicked, draw X cards instead.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped creature you control and put a stun counter on it or pay {U}.
Counter target spell.
Return target creature or planeswalker to its owner’s hand. Until your next turn, each creature you don’t control enters with an additional stun counter on it.

Kicker {1}{U} [i](You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
If this spell was kicked, each player mills three cards.
You may cast an instant or sorcery card from a graveyard without paying its mana cost. If it would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it.
Exile Arcane Thievery.

When Gnawing Vermin enters, target player mills two cards.
When Gnawing Vermin dies, target creature you don’t control gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

First strike [i](This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)[/i]
Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.

Kicker—Exile three other cards from your graveyard. [i](You may exile three other cards from your graveyard in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)[/i]
You may cast Waking Vampire from your graveyard by paying its kicker cost in addition to its other costs.
When Gravedigger enters, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
When Boding Vampire leaves your graveyard, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

{2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Create two Treasure tokens. [i](They’re artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
Sacrifice three Treasures: Draw a card.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature, discard a card, or pay 4 life.
When Dusk Mangler enters, each opponent sacrifices a creature, discards a card, and loses 4 life.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature card with mana value 3 or less.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Flash
When Soul Enervation enters, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Kicker {R} [i](You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Haste
When Goblin Ruinblaster enters, if it was kicked, destroy target nonbasic land.
Pub Stomper enters tapped with two stun counters on it.
Whenever Reckless Detective attacks, you may sacrifice an artifact or discard a card. If you do, draw a card and Reckless Detective gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Kicker {2} [i](You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
If Crag Monstrosity was kicked, it enters with two +1/+1 counters on it
When Crag Monstrosity enters, it deals damage equal to its power to another target creature or planeswalker.

Flying
When Rapacious Dragon enters, create two Treasure tokens. [i](They’re artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]

Create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token for each noncreature card in your graveyard.
{R}, Discard Accomplished Pyromancy: Create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

Whenever Tarhild Elite attacks, you may put up to three stun counters on it. For each stun counter put on it this way, choose one —
• Tarhild Elite gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Tarhild Elite gains double strike until end of turn.
• Tarhild Elite gains trample until end of turn.

Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.

Kicker {R} [i](You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Cinderclasm deals 1 damage to each creature. If it was kicked, it deals 2 damage to each creature instead.

Kicker {5}{R} [i](You may pay an additional {5}{R} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Fight with Fire deals 5 damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked, it deals 10 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets instead. [i](Those targets can include players, planeswalkers, and battles.)[/i]

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may untap another tapped creature you control. If you do, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
{1}, {T}: Surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Kicker {3} [i](You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Vigilance, trample
If Untamed Kavu was kicked, it enters with three +1/+1 counters on it.
When Eternal Witness enters, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

Harvested Treefolk enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Harvested Treefolk while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage, remove a +1/+1 counter from Harvested Treefolk, and create a 0/1 green Log creature token.

Whenever Rampaging Swallower attacks, exile up to one creature card from your graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Rampaging Swallower.
Rampaging Swallower has flying as long as you own a face-up card in exile with flying.  The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.
When Affectionate Indrik enters, you may have it fight target creature you don’t control. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]

Trample
Combat damage that would be dealt by creatures you control can’t be prevented.

Head of the Herd enters with a +1/+1 counter on it if you control another Beast.
Each other Beast creature you control enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

Enchant land
Enchanted land has “{T}: Add three mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast kicked spells.”
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

Exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way. [i](If you cast a spell this way, you still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)[/i]

Haste
{T}, Remove a counter from a creature you control: You gain 1 life.

Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.
Juggernaut can’t be blocked by Walls.

As Brass Herald enters, choose a creature type.
When Brass Herald enters, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

{T}, Remove a counter from a permanent you control: Choose one —
• Put a charge counter on target artifact.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

As Sorcerous Spyglass enters, look at an opponent’s hand, then choose any card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can’t be activated unless they’re mana abilities.

Kicker {1}{W} [i](You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Flying, lifelink
When Emboldening Angel enters, if it was kicked, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

Vigilance, lifelink
Whenever damage that would be dealt to you or a creature you control is prevented, put that many +1/+1 counters on Kuhiel the Benevolent.

Flying, lifelink
If you would gain an amount of life, you gain life equal to Angel of Paradise’s power instead.

Counter up to one target spell that targets you or a creature you control.
If you cast this spell during your main phase, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has flying and vigilance, can’t attack you or planeswalkers you control, and can’t block creatures you control.

Whenever Prison Seal or another nonland, nontoken permanent enters under your control, you may exile target permanent that shares a card type with that permanent until Prison Seal leaves the battlefield.

Flash
Flying
Whenever Skyswimmer blocks a creature, put a stun counter on that creature.

Kicker {4}{U} [i](You may pay an additional {4}{U} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Flying
When Djinn of Secrets enters, if it was kicked, draw seven cards.

Whenever you tap an untapped creature you control, if it isn’t being declared as an attacker, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever you tap an untapped creature an opponent controls, put a stun counter on it.
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.
You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

Accumulating Stormwing costs {X} less to cast, where X is the number of noncreature spells you have cast this turn.
Flying; prowess [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
When Accumulating Stormwing enters, draw a card.

The next sorcery spell you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. [i](It can be cast any time you could cast an instant.)[/i]
Draw a card.

Kicker—Pay 5 life [i](You may pay 5 life in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Flying
When Demon of Shared Sorrow enters, you may have target player’s life total become equal to your own.

Flying, menace, lifelink
Ezikiel, the Dire Dream’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

Deathtouch
Whenever Misfortune Teller enters or deals combat damage to a player, exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, create a 2/2 black Rogue creature token. If it was a land card, create a Treasure token. Otherwise, you gain 3 life.
{T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

Whenever a spell or ability you control causes one or more opponents to lose 1 or more life, add {B}.
Tap three Vampires you control: Each opponent loses 1 life.

This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a token.
Exile target creature or planeswalker and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.

Kicker {X}{R} [i](You may pay an additional {X}{R} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Flying
When Heartfire Dragon enters, if it was kicked, it deals twice X damage to any target.
cards.notes: Can murder opponent with 15 mana. Watch

cards.rules_text:
Menace
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token.
Sacrifice a Treasure: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

First strike
Whenever Dragonspeak Escort attacks, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn and you create a Treasure token. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead. Treasure is an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
cards.notes: Features two different ways to ramp you into big spells. Feels excessive.

cards.rules_text:
Flying, trample; prowess [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever Hellkite Mystic enters or attacks, exile the top four cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles, then exile the top card of your library and assign it to a random pile. Shuffle one of the piles into your library. You may play cards exiled this way on any turn you attacked with Hellkite Mystic.
Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability with a single target, you may pay {1}. If you do, change the target of that spell or ability to a Goblin creature you control.

At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, that player chooses a creature they control. It fights Southkeep Devil. If Southkeep Devil dies this way, the chosen creature’s controller creates a Treasure token.

Kicker {2}{G} [i](You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
This spell can’t be countered.
Hexproof, haste
If Cragplate Baloth was kicked, it enters with four +1/+1 counters on it.

Murroc, the Living Cycle gets +1/+1 for each land you control.
You may play land cards from your graveyard.

Whenever Deathgorge Scavenger enters or attacks, you may exile target card from a graveyard. If a creature card is exiled this way, you gain 2 life. If a noncreature card is exiled this way, Deathgorge Scavenger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Primalgoyf’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards. [i](The card types are artifact, battle, creature, enchantment, instant, kindred, land, planeswalker, and sorcery.)[/i]

When Territorial Nestmother dies, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is its power. You may put any number of creatures with total power X or less from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

You and other permanents you control have ward {X}, where X is the number of counters on you or that permanent.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

For each card type, return up to one card of that type from your graveyard to your hand.
Exile Autumn’s Blessing.

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library, then create a token that’s a copy of Knowledge Wave.
Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, exile it. If you do, you may cast another nonland card you own exiled by sources named Knowledge Wave without paying that card’s mana cost.

Search target opponent’s library for a card and exile it face down.  Then that player shuffles. You may look at and cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.

Flying, haste
Lightning Phoenix can’t block.
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent was dealt 3 or more damage this turn, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Lightning Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Destroy all artifacts.
If a permanent you control would be dealt damage or destroyed, you may remove a stun counter from it instead.

As Numerophile enters, secretly choose and note a number from 1 to 5.
At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, that player chooses a number from 1 to 5 which they haven’t chosen this way. If the noted number is chosen, reveal that number, sacrifice Numerophile, you draw that many cards and you lose that much life. Otherwise, that player loses life equal to the chosen number.

[+1]: Up to one target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

[+1]: Tap up to one target permanent and put a stun counter on it.
